00011 CQuantizer::CQuantizer (UINT nMaxColors, UINT nColorBits)
00012 {
00013     m_pTree = NULL;
00014     m_nLeafCount = 0;
00015     for (int i=0; i<=(int) nColorBits; i++)
00016         m_pReducibleNodes[i] = NULL;
00017     m_nMaxColors = nMaxColors;
00018     m_nColorBits = nColorBits;
00019 }
00020 
00021 CQuantizer::~CQuantizer ()
00022 {
00023     if (m_pTree != NULL)
00024         DeleteTree (&m_pTree);
00025 }

00027 BOOL CQuantizer::ProcessImage (BYTE *pData, int iWidth, int iHeight )
00028 {
00029     BYTE* pbBits;
00030     BYTE r, g, b;
00031     int i, j;
00032 
00033 
00034     pbBits = (BYTE*)pData;
00035     for (i=0; i<iHeight; i++) {
00036         for (j=0; j<iWidth; j++) {
00037             b = *pbBits++;
00038             g = *pbBits++;
00039             r = *pbBits++;
00040             AddColor (&m_pTree, r, g, b, m_nColorBits, 0, &m_nLeafCount,
00041                 m_pReducibleNodes);
00042             while (m_nLeafCount > m_nMaxColors)
00043                 ReduceTree (m_nColorBits, &m_nLeafCount, m_pReducibleNodes);
00044         }
00045                         //Padding
00046         //pbBits ++;
00047     }
00048     return TRUE;
00049 }

00051 int CQuantizer::GetLeftShiftCount (DWORD dwVal)
00052 {
00053     int nCount = 0;
00054     for (int i=0; i<sizeof (DWORD) * 8; i++) {
00055         if (dwVal & 1)
00056             nCount++;
00057         dwVal >>= 1;
00058     }
00059     return (8 - nCount);
00060 }
00061 
00062 int CQuantizer::GetRightShiftCount (DWORD dwVal)
00063 {
00064     for (int i=0; i<sizeof (DWORD) * 8; i++) {
00065         if (dwVal & 1)
00066             return i;
00067         dwVal >>= 1;
00068     }
00069     return -1;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CQuantizer::AddColor (NODE** ppNode, BYTE r, BYTE g, BYTE b,
00073     UINT nColorBits, UINT nLevel, UINT* pLeafCount, NODE** pReducibleNodes)
00074 {
00075     static BYTE mask[8] = { 0x80, 0x40, 0x20, 0x10, 0x08, 0x04, 0x02, 0x01 };
00076 
00077     //
00078     // If the node doesn't exist, create it.
00079     //
00080     if (*ppNode == NULL)
00081         *ppNode = CreateNode (nLevel, nColorBits, pLeafCount,
00082             pReducibleNodes);
00083 
00084     //
00085     // Update color information if it's a leaf node.
00086     //
00087     if ((*ppNode)->bIsLeaf) {
00088         (*ppNode)->nPixelCount++;
00089         (*ppNode)->nRedSum += r;
00090         (*ppNode)->nGreenSum += g;
00091         (*ppNode)->nBlueSum += b;
00092     }
00093 
00094     //
00095     // Recurse a level deeper if the node is not a leaf.
00096     //
00097     else {
00098         int shift = 7 - nLevel;
00099         int nIndex = (((r & mask[nLevel]) >> shift) << 2) |
00100             (((g & mask[nLevel]) >> shift) << 1) |
00101             ((b & mask[nLevel]) >> shift);
00102         AddColor (&((*ppNode)->pChild[nIndex]), r, g, b, nColorBits,
00103             nLevel + 1, pLeafCount, pReducibleNodes);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 NODE* CQuantizer::CreateNode (UINT nLevel, UINT nColorBits, UINT* pLeafCount,
00108     NODE** pReducibleNodes)
00109 {
00110     NODE* pNode;
00111 
00112     if ((pNode = (NODE*) HeapAlloc (GetProcessHeap (), HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY,
00113         sizeof (NODE))) == NULL)
00114         return NULL;
00115 
00116     pNode->bIsLeaf = (nLevel == nColorBits) ? TRUE : FALSE;
00117     if (pNode->bIsLeaf)
00118         (*pLeafCount)++;
00119     else {
00120         pNode->pNext = pReducibleNodes[nLevel];
00121         pReducibleNodes[nLevel] = pNode;
00122     }
00123     return pNode;
00124 }
00125 
00126 void CQuantizer::ReduceTree (UINT nColorBits, UINT* pLeafCount,
00127     NODE** pReducibleNodes)
00128 {
00129     //
00130     // Find the deepest level containing at least one reducible node.
00131     //
00132     for (int i=nColorBits - 1; (i>0) && (pReducibleNodes[i] == NULL); i--);
00133 
00134     //
00135     // Reduce the node most recently added to the list at level i.
00136     //
00137     NODE* pNode = pReducibleNodes[i];
00138     pReducibleNodes[i] = pNode->pNext;
00139 
00140     UINT nRedSum = 0;
00141     UINT nGreenSum = 0;
00142     UINT nBlueSum = 0;
00143     UINT nChildren = 0;
00144 
00145     for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00146         if (pNode->pChild[i] != NULL) {
00147             nRedSum += pNode->pChild[i]->nRedSum;
00148             nGreenSum += pNode->pChild[i]->nGreenSum;
00149             nBlueSum += pNode->pChild[i]->nBlueSum;
00150             pNode->nPixelCount += pNode->pChild[i]->nPixelCount;
00151             HeapFree (GetProcessHeap (), 0, pNode->pChild[i]);
00152             pNode->pChild[i] = NULL;
00153             nChildren++;
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     pNode->bIsLeaf = TRUE;
00158     pNode->nRedSum = nRedSum;
00159     pNode->nGreenSum = nGreenSum;
00160     pNode->nBlueSum = nBlueSum;
00161     *pLeafCount -= (nChildren - 1);
00162 }
00163 
00164 void CQuantizer::DeleteTree (NODE** ppNode)
00165 {
00166     for (int i=0; i<8; i++) {
00167         if ((*ppNode)->pChild[i] != NULL)
00168             DeleteTree (&((*ppNode)->pChild[i]));
00169     }
00170     HeapFree (GetProcessHeap (), 0, *ppNode);
00171     *ppNode = NULL;
00172 }
00173 
00174 void CQuantizer::GetPaletteColors (NODE* pTree, RGBQUAD* prgb, UINT* pIndex)
00175 {
00176     if (pTree->bIsLeaf) {
00177         prgb[*pIndex].rgbRed =
00178             (BYTE) ((pTree->nRedSum) / (pTree->nPixelCount));
00179         prgb[*pIndex].rgbGreen =
00180             (BYTE) ((pTree->nGreenSum) / (pTree->nPixelCount));
00181         prgb[*pIndex].rgbBlue =
00182             (BYTE) ((pTree->nBlueSum) / (pTree->nPixelCount));
00183         prgb[*pIndex].rgbReserved = 0;
00184         (*pIndex)++;
00185     }
00186     else {
00187         for (int i=0; i<8; i++) {
00188             if (pTree->pChild[i] != NULL)
00189                 GetPaletteColors (pTree->pChild[i], prgb, pIndex);
00190         }
00191     }
00192 }
00193 
00194 UINT CQuantizer::GetColorCount ()
00195 {
00196     return m_nLeafCount;
00197 }
00198 
00199 void CQuantizer::GetColorTable (RGBQUAD* prgb)
00200 {
00201     UINT nIndex = 0;
00202     GetPaletteColors (m_pTree, prgb, &nIndex);
00203 }
